General.Name: Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited
General.Description: Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited provides overburden and lignite removal services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers coal removal and extraction services, as well as operates power plants; and soil and coal extraction, and removal services for the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand. It also rents machinery; and offers machinery maintenance, and mining panning and consulting services. In addition, the company engages in civil engineering construction works; and utility systems construction works, such as roads, residences, etc. Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
